ygData.subject: Watching the Allience
ygData.msgSnippet: Lady Hawk transforms to Hawk mode and flies over to Squizzy. Hold on little one, sit back and watch the fight you ll learn a lot more that way and you re less

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Lady Hawk transforms to Hawk mode and flies over to Squizzy. "Hold on little
one, sit back and watch the fight you'll learn a lot more that way and
you're less likely to be shot." Lady Hawk saw great potential in this bot
for some odd reason she wanted to keep Squizzy around. She saw nothing for
the Alliance but destruction and knew that there was no way she'd let her
fathers dream be distorted by the likes of them. She had the printouts from
the CR chambers, and her father had the skill to recreate the DNA patterns
he needed. There wasn't a reason to stay other than to watch the fight. It
was the perfect chance to escape, unfortunately Squizzy knew to much about
her experiments to be left behind. She couldn't leave the mongoose behind
while it was still functioning. something had to be done soon and she had to
decide what it was.
----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, November 03, 2000 4:22 PM
Subject: Defending the Allience


> Squizzy> Starts firing heavy duty tranquilizer darts randomly at the
attacking
> bots who were close to the base.
